WO-IMPL-QA-MOCK-REGRESSION.title: Implement QA & Test Mock Regression Strategy
WO-IMPL-QA-MOCK-REGRESSION.instruction_raw: Replace MagicMock DTOs with strict dataclasses and specced Protocol mocks across all tests. Implement SimulationStateBuilder in tests/factories/state_builder.py. Fix stale attributes (system_command_queue) and handle frozen dataclasses using dataclasses.replace(). Ensure 100% test pass rate.

WO-IMPL-FINANCE-MACRO.title: Implement Finance & Macro Stability
WO-IMPL-FINANCE-MACRO.instruction_raw: Resolve financial debts: TD-FIN-NEGATIVE-M2, TD-BANK-RESERVE-CRUNCH, TD-FIN-FLOAT-RESIDUE, TD-FIN-MAGIC-BASE-RATE. Implement IMonetaryLedger, IBankReserveSystem, and ICentralBank protocols. Ensure all financial transfers use integer pennies (int) and pass audit_zero_sum_integrity.

WO-IMPL-LIFECYCLE-INTEGRITY.title: Implement Lifecycle & Agent Integrity
WO-IMPL-LIFECYCLE-INTEGRITY.instruction_raw: Resolve lifecycle debts: TD-LIFECYCLE-GHOST-FIRM, TD-ECON-ZOMBIE-FIRM, TD-ARCH-ORPHAN-SAGA. Implement IAgentLifecycleManager for atomic agent registration across registry and ledger. Ensure deactivation clears sagas and orders. Handle basic food starvation logic.
